data.title: Dexter Star Michael C. Hall Ties the Knot For the Third Time in a Surprise Ceremony
data.meta_description: PS makes wellness more accessible through real-life stories, first-person perspectives, and expert-backed information. Our staff of journalists and subject-matter experts research, report, and produce articles, videos, and social content that help people feel good about their well-being choices, no matter what they are. Via our core verticals — Health, Fitness, Beauty, Balance, Identity, and Shopping — we help our audience proceed with confidence.
data.text: Michael C. Hall is officially off the market! The Dexter star got married for the third time on Monday when he tied the knot with girlfriend Morgan Macgregor in a surprise ceremony at City Hall in NYC. Michael has been dating the LA-based writer since 2012 after he split from ex-wife and former costar Jennifer Carpenter. Michael was also previously married to Amy Spanger from 2002 to 2007. Congratulations to the happy couple!
